name: Galaxy Cat (demo)
description:
Galaxy Cat (temporary name) is a platformer game made up of single screen challenges. You play as the Cosmic Kitten, a being created to restart the dormant portals connecting the galaxy together. The demo consists of 20 levels from the first world, so the platforming is pretty basic for now. 

The full game is currently in development, and I plan to update this demo a few more times as it gets closer to completion. The full game is planned to have five worlds, with a bonus challenge world unlocked after finishing the game for the first time. I hope you all enjoy the demo!
